send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as we can! Welcome to Sonoma County Scanner Updates! (4/4)

dispatching, EMS, military, or other scanner, or public safety related things. We post all our updates here but also to Facebook (@SCScanner) and Instagram (@SonomaScanner) If you have any tips or suggestions, (3/4)

We occasionally delay posts for officer safety but do our best to get information out to the community in real time. We are 100% donation run and appreciate so so much all the support we get from the community! All three of our admins have experience in law, (2/4)

These can easily start a fire and deadly carbon monoxide gas - which is odorless and invisible - may build up in your home. • Due to high fire danger, the use of fireplaces, fire pits or other outdoor heating devices is discouraged.

• Dress warmly and have several blankets on hand. • Stay indoors with doors and windows shut; keep pets indoors. • Check on the safety of elderly and medically frail neighbors. • Do not use camp stoves, charcoal or gas grills, or other open-flame heat inside your home.
